
Introduction
============

A tool to generate sample website content of the form::

    index.html
    lorem/index.html
    ipsum/index.html
    ...

And so on.

Credits
=======

Uses James Hales' lorem-ipsum-generator
(http://pypi.python.org/pypi/lorem-ipsum-generator) to generate text.

Contact
=======

Questions/comments/concerns? Email: aclark@aclark.net
